about_the_game:
by Heroes of the Storm,
All World has been Distorted. To Find Kimchi, the Player will Travel "every" world.



move to storm, select world
first in your home, storm has come to Joseon. everything has been swallowed.
To Find precious Kimchi, go to storm!
medieval castle, desert Palace , pirate island , moon base... 6 maps you can choose



summon powerful weapons
weapon button in Tab menu, you can summon weapons .
To Erase, drop weapon to filed and click waste button .
To Switch wepon, press 123 button.

Odds and Ends 81% - 20
Useful 15% - 20
good 3% - 15
unique 0.6% - 5
fantasy 0.12% - 4
ultimate 0.01% - 3



various enemy
16 small , 10 normal , 6boss. they come repeatedly in certain time.
enemies has various skills, so jump up to roof or ambush behind or escape collect gold.
Run button in Tab menu, you can go to start position.


Survive infinitely

name: Do You Know Kimchi?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: realtek
  • VR Support: no Support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: realtek
